subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Shanshan Feng, who won last year’s L.P.G.A. Championship, is coming off a runner-up finish last week at the ShopRite L.P.G.A. Classic and has risen to No. 7 in the world rankings.
snippet: Shanshan Feng, who won last year’s L.P.G.A. Championship, is coming off a runner-up finish last week at the ShopRite L.P.G.A. Classic and has risen to No. 7 in the world rankings.
